name: Madr
body:
### Welcome to madr
This R package handles the post-processing from the Bayesian Uncertainty Characterization Framework MAD#: The Method of Anchored Distributions. To learn more about MAD#, visit [our Codeplex site](http://www.codeplex.com/mad).

### Installation
For easy installation, install and load the `devtools` package from CRAN, then call `install_github("hsavoy/madr")`. 

### Examples
See the [madr vignette](http://hsavoy.github.io/madr/vignettes/madr.html) for an introduction to the R package. 

### Authors and Contributors
Heather Savoy (@hsavoy)

### Support or Contact
Please use the [issue tracker](https://github.com/hsavoy/madr/issues) for this project to post issue tickets and feature requests. Contact Heather at frystacka@berkeley.edu for further questions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
